strapiPost.title: Tune In
strapiPost.content:
If you attended the FreshGrass Festival this past weekend, you know there is mighty fine talent that finds itself in NWA.

  • Music nights: From Thursday through the weekend, there are dozens of concerts and gigs happening around Northwest Arkansas including the Hillberry Harvest Moon Festival in Eureka Springs.
  • Where it's at: Concert venues around the region stay full of music, but so do local dives like bars, breweries, and even wineries. There will be artists playing at Moonbroch, Chelsea's, King Fish Bar, Sassafras Vineyard Winery, and more.

Check out The Free Weekly’s list of this week’s live music HERE.
